Package playn.core.gl

Interface Summary
GL20 Platform-independent interface and values for OpenGL ES 2.0, based on the official JOGL GL2ES2 interface.
GLBuffer An abstraction over bulk buffers for use with GLShader and GLProgram.
GLBuffer.Float A buffer of 32-bit floats.
GLBuffer.Short A buffer of 16-bit unsigned integers.
GLPattern Provide access to the texture that implements a pattern in GL.
GLProgram Provides the GL methods and buffer management needed to implement a GL shader.
GLShader.Attrib Provides the ability to bind a vertex attrib array.
GLShader.Uniform1f Provides the ability to bind a uniform float value.
GLShader.Uniform1i Provides the ability to bind a single uniform int.
GLShader.Uniform2f Provides the ability to bind a uniform float pair.
GLShader.Uniform2fv Provides the ability to bind a uniform vec2 vector.
GLShader.Uniform2i Provides the ability to bind a uniform int pair.
GLShader.Uniform3f Provides the ability to bind a uniform float triple.
GLShader.Uniform4f Provides the ability to bind a uniform float four-tuple.
GLShader.Uniform4fv Provides the ability to bind a uniform vec4 vector.
GLShader.UniformMatrix4fv Provides the ability to bind a uniform matrix4 vector.
 

Class Summary
AbstractCanvasGL<GC> A base class for Canvas implementations for GL backends.
AbstractImageGL<GC>  
GL20Buffer GLBuffer implementation based on java.nio and usable with GL20.
GL20Buffer.FloatImpl  
GL20Buffer.ShortImpl  
GL20Context A GLContext implementation based on GL20.
GL20Program A shader program implementation built on the GL20 API.
GLContext  
GLContext.Stats Used to track and report rendering statistics.
GLShader Defines the interface to shaders used by the GL core.
GLShader.Extras Handles the extra bits needed when we're using textures or flat color.
GLUtil  
GraphicsGL Handles the common implementation of Graphics for GL-based backends.
GroupLayerGL  
GroupLayerGL.Clipped  
ImageGL<GC>  
ImageLayerGL  
ImageRegionGL<GC>  
ImmediateLayerGL  
ImmediateLayerGL.Clipped  
IndexedTrisShader A GLShader implementation that decomposes quads into indexed triangles.
LayerGL  
QuadShader A GLShader implementation that only handles quads.
Scale Encapsulates a scale factor, provides useful utility methods.
Scale.ScaledResource Used by Scale.getScaledResources(java.lang.String).
SurfaceGL  
SurfaceImageGL  
SurfaceLayerGL  
 

Enum Summary
GLContext.Filter Used to configure texture image scaling.
